sentences: John Herndon is an American instrumental hip hop producer from Chicago, Illinois.
He produced Deep Puddle Dynamics' song entitled "More from June" in 2002.
He released the Missing Dragons EP under the alias A Grape Dope on Galaxia in 2003.
Doseone - "By Horoscope Light I&II" from Ha (2005)
Tommy Guerrero  - "Birds Over Head (John Herndon Remix)" from Junk Collector (2001)
